# SOP of A Project

## Initiate a hackmd

  * <https://hackmd.io>  
    * Wiki of the project
    * Easy access for everyone
    
  * example: <https://hackmd.io/@tpemartin/HyZrubd4u>
  
## Initiate a Github **Project**

  * Only EMajor-USR collaborators do this.
  * <https://github.com/tpemartin/EMajor-USR/projects>  
    * Detail must put down hackmd link
    
  * Add **project dashboard** to project hackmd
  
  * example: **海報SVG with QR**: <https://github.com/tpemartin/EMajor-USR/projects/3>
  
## Initiate an R project inside Github Repo

  * Start a new R project within EMajor-USR repo (Don't forget to commit & push)
  * Put project link in project hackmd.

  * example: <https://hackmd.io/@tpemartin/HyZrubd4u>
